issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Add support for untyped node
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17701](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17701). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The parser will first emit untyped literal and function nodes before type inference. We need to update the ToString method of Gandiva nodes to avoid seg fault.

Other methods aren't affected because untyped nodes are only used inside the parser.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17701?focusedCommentId=17603770) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14110
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14110>
